meanings.definition: To turn or pivot on a swivel.
meanings.sent1: She was swivelling in her chair to see the view outside.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic was swivelling the chair to reach the tools behind him.
meanings.sent3: The penguin was swivelling its head comically to look at the fish.
meanings.sent4: His eyes were swivelling around the room, trying to find the hidden treasure.
meanings.sent5: The owl's head was swivelling silently in the dark, searching for prey.

meanings.definition: The act of rotating or turning on a swivel.
meanings.sent1: The constant swivelling of the chair made him dizzy.
meanings.sent2: The smooth swivelling of the camera captured every angle of the dance.
meanings.sent3: The swivelling of the disco ball reflected colorful lights all around.
meanings.sent4: The swivelling of the compass needle pointed north without fail.
meanings.sent5: The swivelling of the lighthouse beacon guided ships safely to shore.
